name: How to turn on your computer while in bed
name_original: How to turn on your computer while in bed
description:
How to turn on your computer while in bed is a Week1 assignment of creating the Rube Goldberg machine from the Creative Coding class.

There are no coding involved in this project, just incorporating physics in Unity.

For this project, I wanted to add a solid theme for an environment before playing with physics. Randomly before an online class began, I wanted to turn on my computer without getting out of my cozy bed --- and this inspired me to create the Rube Goldberg Machine with a bedroom environment game using objects that can easily find in our rooms!
